title: LF ADC for duo S1+
body: In my promos to gold, have lost 2 and won 1 so far. I am looking for an ADC main to climb with. Please have a decent champ pool, MUST be s1+ unless you can prove you have good skills with adc. Must have ts or skype, and must have a good attitude. No salt shakers and no ragers. If your interested add me ign Nugget Ninja

replies.body: adc s4 - Trist, Jinx, Jhin, sivir, cait all mastered
